item.description:
Please note that:
Classes have been changed to Sept, as many people will be busy in the summer-
The class schedule is listed below:



Witchcraft Training Series Online Classes

The Pagan Learning Center is now offering ONLINE Wicca classes in a Witchcraft Training Series with classes beginning May 8th 2009.

Each class builds upon each other, and each one
must be completed before moving on to the next.

Upon completion of the first (4) levels, the student will graduate to the Level
of the First Degree toward Priest/ Priestess level.
Witchcraft Training- Level 1 will begin online, on May 8th.

Classes will be done "live" in Yahoo IM, and class material will be sent through a yahoo email group,
where people can also ask questions.

Classes are $5.00 per class; $35.00 per Level.
There will also be an additional day seminar for hands-on activities for each level that
is an additional $25.00, and is optional.
Upon the completion of all four levels, participant will be given a certificate to the Level of the First Degree, and will then be eligible to continue toward Level Two
Priest/ Priestess Training, or become a prospect of the Wolf Hill Grove.

This is the first introductory class, in the series of (4) classes of training towards the Level of the First Degree towards Priest/ Priestess training.

Classes will begin on Tuesday evening, Sept. 8th, from 7:00-9:00 pm


Class Schedule is as follows:

Class l â€“ Tues Sept 8th

The difference between Wicca & Witchcraft
Wiccan Glossary
Wiccan Beliefs
Wiccan Rede
3-Fold Law
Pentacle & Pentagram

Class 2 - Tues Sept 22nd

The Wiccan Way
History of Paganism
The Burning Times
Salem Witch Trials



Class 3 - Tuesday Oct 6th

Important Pagan People
Witches Rede of Chivalry
Intro to the (8) Sabbats
The Esbats
The Elements
13 Goals of a Witch


Class 4 - Tues Oct 20th

Principles of Pagan Belief
The Moon & Her Phases
The God & The Goddess
Pagan Ettiquette
Wiccan Traditions

Class 5 - Tues Nov 3rd

Rites of Passage
Intro to Gardnerian Wicca
Covens & Degree Systems
Initiation
How to Meditate/ Group Exercise

Class 6 - Tues Nov 17th
Intro to Ritual
Book of Shadow/ Grimoires
Numerology/ How to find your Witch Name
Good/ Bad Teachers & Groups
Class Activity: Psychic Exercises
Dedication




To check out information on all of the classes, view pictures and testimonials of previous students, go to:


Website: http://community-2.we...

For questions or further information, please email Tala at:
Talawolf7@webtv.net
